header.title: WP-United: Upgrade from v0.9.0.x
header.author-notes: Make sure you follow the instructions in the DIY INSTRUCTIONS section, in order for this MOD to work properly! Visit http://www.wp-united.com for more help or information.

action-group.diy-instructions:
When copying files, you can delete everything in your old phpbb-root/wp-united directory before copying files over.
Following this, visit your phpBB Admin Control Panel, and purge your phpBB cache.
The control panel can now be found within WordPress, under WP-United.
